title: US: Indian-origin man charged with attempting to kill president after he rams truck near White House
content:
A man of Indian origin was arrested in Washington on Monday after he crashed a truck into security barriers near the White House, the New York Times reported. After the crash, he took out a Nazi flag from his backpack. He later told the authorities that he wanted to kill the US president and admired Adolf Hitler.Sai Varshith Kandula, 19, has said that his goal was to â€œget to the White House, seize power and be put in charge of the nationâ€, according to an affidavit filed in a US District Court on Tuesday. When asked how he planned to seize power, Kandula said he would â€œkill the president if thatâ€™s what I have to do and would hurt anyone that would stand in my wayâ€. He had been planning the attack for six months, Kandula told the investigators.Among other offences, Kandula has been charged with  threatening to kill or kidnap or harm a president, vice president or family member, the New York Times reported.The US Park Police, on Tuesday, also charged Kandula for assault with a dangerous weapon, reckless operation of a motor vehicle, destruction of federal property in excess of $1,000 and trespassing.He appeared in DC Superior Court on Tuesday afternoon and was held in custody without bail, reported CNN.Here are the court docâ€™s ğŸ‘‰ compiled by @SecretService in this investigation. 19yo Sai Kandula was held w/out bond by a D.C. Around 9.35 pm, he drove onto security barriers on a pavement near Lafayette Square, a park in front of the White House. He then put the truck in reverse and drove into the barriers again.After he was held, Kandula told the security officials that he admired the â€œgreat historyâ€ of the Nazis and their â€œauthoritarian nature, eugenics and their one world orderâ€.
